judges.raw: {"score": 1, "rationale": "The response proposes several concrete experiments and ablations, such as Leave-one-group-out (LOGO) feature ablations, cumulative ablation curves, time-freeze and metadata sanitization, section-specific ablations, confound-only and confound-controlled models, cross-source/cross-year feature transfer, and deduplication/split hygiene stress tests.
